# **EVS 3000L Map Tutorial**

---

## **Step 1: Basic HTML Structure**

```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Basic Webpage</title>
</head>
<body>
    <h1>Welcome to EVS 3000L Map Tutorial</h1>
    <p>This is a simple HTML page.</p>
</body>
</html>

---

## **Step 2: Adding JavaScript Libraries**

```html

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Leaflet Map</title>
    
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css" />
    <script src="https://unpkg.com/leaflet/dist/leaflet.js"></script>
</head>
<body>
    <h1>Leaflet Map Example</h1>
    <p>We are now ready to create a map!</p>
</body>
</html>

---

## **Step 3: Adding CSS Styles**


<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Styled Leaflet Map</title>

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css" />
    <script src="https://unpkg.com/leaflet/dist/leaflet.js"></script>

    <style>
        #mapid {
            height: 100vh;
            width: 100%;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <h1>Leaflet Map with CSS</h1>
    <div id="mapid"></div>
</body>
</html>
